title: When Will Nintendo Stop Making Weird Decisions? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.16.22
description:
Blessing and Andy talk about Nintendo taking shutting down Wii U and 3DS stores, other weird Nintendo decisions, and a new studio from Witcher 3 devs.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:31 - Housekeeping

Keep your eyes and ears locked to youtube.com/KindaFunny and the Screencast podcast feed because we’re recording our Uncharted Movie review today and it’ll go up as soon as it’s ready.

The Roper Report -

00:06:47 - Nintendo Closing 3DS & Wii U Shops In 2023
00:19:21 - The Last of Us HBO Show Not Coming in 2022
00:20:21 - Nintendo is forbidding Switch Sports play testers from sharing info on social media
00:25:52 - The Witcher 3’ Game Director Assembles New Startup Studio
00:39:14 - Ads
00:41:19 - A Third Sonic movie is on the way AND a Knuckles spinoff series
00:52:12 - New Dying Light 2 patch ‘fixes the death loop bug’ and adds a backup save system
01:00:18 - Out today
01:03:24 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tam & Tim
